column4: i'm  new on xchat . i automatically join ubuntu server as soon as i  run the program . how can i change it , please ?
Xchat -> serverlist -> "edit" theh Freenode selection. untick "autoconnect on startup"
click on XChat menu item. Click on "Server List..." click on "Freenode" click "edit"-button. untick "Autoconnect to this netwrok at startup"
